attributes.action: Revoke the Declaration of Independence and assert British rule over the USA
attributes.additional_details: Trump's MAGA movement is proving to be a danger to the rest of the world. First Venezuela, next Greenland. Then, the world. It's time we used Trump's own words to the effect he wants. The British landed in American and claimed it as their own when in reality it should have been owned by the Native Americans. It's time to put Donald Trump into a care home and fix the mess that's left of the USA.
attributes.background: The Americans in 1776 signed the declaration of independence declaring America independent of the Kingdom of Great Britain. Since then, they have made a hash of it. They can't be trusted anymore so we should take control back.

rejection.details: It is a matter for the Government of the US of A to revoke what is their own declaration.
